Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt, with the Holy Family succoured by angels Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Pier Francesco Mola
Curator's comments: Albani's composition can be dated to c. 1640. See F. Petrucci, 'Pier Francesco Mola (1612-1666): materia e colore nella pittura del '600', Rome, 2012, p. 211.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Charles Francis Arnold Howard, 5th Earl of Wicklow
